General.Name: J.ESTINA Co.Ltd
General.Description: J.ESTINA Co.,Ltd. produces and sells jewelry and handbags in South Korea. The company provides fashion jewelry under the J.ESTINA Red brand; and French perfumes under the JE PARFUMS brand, as well as cleansing balms under the J.ESTINA BEAUTY. It also sells its products online. The company was formerly known as Romanson Co., Ltd. and changed its name to J.ESTINA Co.,Ltd. in May 2016. The company was founded in 1988 and is based in Seoul, South Korea.
